
```{r}
fp <- get_rehab_filepath()
lf_adr <- list.files(paste0(Sys.getenv("LEAD_REHAB_FOLDER"), "archive/"), pattern = "DataExport_.*.xlsx", full.names = TRUE)
lf_con <- list.files(paste0(Sys.getenv("LEAD_REHAB_FOLDER"), "contractors/"), pattern = "contractor-docs.xlsx", full.names = TRUE)

library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
library(stringr)
library(lubridate)
library(gt)
library(reactable)
library(shelbyR)

raw_cases <- read_excel(fp, sheet = 2) |> 
  janitor::clean_names() |> 
  mutate(bid_open = bid_date - days(14), .before = bid_date) |> 
  arrange(bid_date)

neighborly_cases <- read_excel(lf_adr, sheet = 1) |> 
  janitor::clean_names() |> 
  rename(address = 4) |> 
  shelbyR::clean_address(address)

contractor_names <- read_excel(lf_con, sheet = 1) |> 
  select(ID, nickname)
```

::: {.panel-tabset}
## Active

```{r eval=TRUE}
out_to_bid <- raw_cases |>
  filter(project_status == "out for bid") |>
  select(street_name, bid_date)
```

There are currently `r nrow(out_to_bid)` rehab projects out to bid:

```{r eval=TRUE}
out_to_bid |>
  gt() |>
  tab_header(
    title = md("**Projects Currently Out to Bid**")
  ) |>
  cols_label(
    street_name = "Project",
    bid_date = "Bid End Date"
  ) |>
  fmt_date(
    columns = bid_date,
    date_style = "yMMMd"
  ) |>
  tab_options(table.width = "100%")
```

## Most Recent

```{r}
most_recent <- raw_cases |> 
  filter(bid_date <= lubridate::today()) |> 
  slice_max(bid_date) |> 
  select(bid_date, street_name, contractor, bid)

most_recent_date <- unique(most_recent$bid_date)

most_recent_all_bids <- read_bids(as.character(most_recent_date))
most_recent_all_bids <- most_recent_all_bids |> 
  summarise(bid = sum(bid_amount, na.rm = TRUE),
            .by = c(case_id, contractor_id)) |> 
  arrange(case_id, bid) |> 
  left_join(neighborly_cases |> select(case_id, street_name)) |> 
  left_join(contractor_names, by = c("contractor_id" = "ID")) |> 
  select(street_name, contractor = nickname, bid)
```

```{r}
reactable(
  most_recent,
  striped = TRUE,
  columns = list(
    street_name = colDef(name = "Project"),
    bid_date = colDef(name = "Bid Date",
                      format = colFormat(date = TRUE)),
    contractor = colDef(name = "Contractor"),
    bid = colDef(
      name = "Bid Amount",
      format = colFormat(
        currency = "USD",
        digits = 0,
        separators = TRUE
      )
    )
  ),
  details = function(index) {
    bid_details <-
      most_recent_all_bids[most_recent_all_bids$street_name == most_recent$street_name[index],]
    htmltools::div(style = "float: right; width: 47%", 
                   reactable(bid_details, 
                             # compact = TRUE,
                             bordered = TRUE,
                             highlight = TRUE,
                             wrap = FALSE,
                             striped = TRUE,
                             # fullWidth = TRUE,
                             columns = list(
    street_name = colDef(show = FALSE),
    contractor = colDef(name = "Contractor"),
    bid = colDef(
      name = "Bid",
      format = colFormat(
        currency = "USD",
        digits = 0,
        separators = TRUE
      )
    )
  )))
  }
)
```


```{r eval=FALSE}
most_recent |> 
  gt() |> 
  tab_header(
    title = md("**Most Recent Bid Opening**")
  ) |> 
  cols_label(
    street_name = "Project",
    bid_date = "Bid Date",
    contractor = "Contractor",
    bid = "Bid Amount"
  ) |> 
  fmt_date(
    columns = bid_date,
    date_style = "yMMMd"
  ) |> 
  fmt_currency(
    columns = bid,
    decimals = 0
  ) |> 
  tab_options(table.width = "100%")
```

Note: These are preliminary results. No results are official until approved by our purchasing department.
